modulate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to change the sound of your voice
modulate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to change a process or activity to make it more controlled, slower, less strong etc
modulate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: These drugs modulate the disease process.
modulate.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to move from one key to another in a piece of music using a series of related chords
modulate.translation[0].definitions[3].d: to change the form of a radio signal so that it can be broadcast more effectively
